overview: The Ed Wood Awards honored the worst horror films ever made. The Awards were hosted by indie-filmmakers Ted A. Bohus and Fred Olen Ray. This DVD is a love letter to those guerrilla filmmakers who didn't make great art, but rather lovable trash which also manages to brighten their audience's day by giving them a few much needed laughs. Not such a bad legacy to have!
tagline: The Worst Horror Movies Ever Made
title: The Ed Wood Awards
